name: pettily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that gives too much attention to things that are not important: I should be able to invite whoever I want to my party without other people pettily getting upset. Why would anyone behave in a such a pettily spiteful manner?
More examplesFewer examplesThey pettily argued that their actions were not strictly forbidden by the law.She found the people in her new town were just as pettily provincial as the people she had been trying to escape from.I can pettily enjoy the thought of my former rival's disgrace.
